{{Client event}}
 
This event is triggered when a player's voice sound is paused using [[/setSoundPaused.md|setSoundPaused]].

==Parameters== 
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
string reason
</syntaxhighlight> 

*'''reason''': the reason for the pause, this can be only "paused".

==Source==
The [[/event_system#Event_source.md|source]] of this event is the [[/Element/Player.md|player]] whose voice got paused.

==Example== 
This example outputs nick of whoever's voice is paused.
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
addEventHandler("onClientPlayerVoicePause", root,
    function ()
        outputChatBox(getPlayerName(source) .. "'s voice got paused.")
    end
)
</syntaxhighlight>
